directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Spray 8x8-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray; set aside.
Combine cream cheese, garlic powder and pepper in large bowl. Add mozzarella cheese, drained tomatoes and artichokes to bowl; stir gently to combine.
Place mixture in baking dish. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Serve with pita chips or French bread, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Hunt's® Petite Diced Tomatoes, drained well
1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained, chopped
Kangaroo® Pita Chips or sliced French bread (optional)
title: PAM's Creamy Artichoke-Tomato Dip
